Congratulations!

You have been added to our panlist. Some important final steps:

(1) Attendance Tracking

Use the QR Code Generator below to create a QR code with your first and last name. In order for your attendance to be counted you must have your QR code scanned at each YUDI event. Be sure to be able to access the QR code from your phone.


(2) YUDI Competition

Choose a team of 2-4 people on your own - it doesn't matter if they're a YUDI member or not - and follow the instructions at the link below. There is no entry fee or cost associated with entering the competition. You may want to bookmark the link for future reference. The competition starts Jan 19th. Deadline to register is Jan 25th at 12am. (If you would like to compete individually please email yaleudi@gmail.com)
